sh'anta ne / pha la na pha la na / ba ra ba ra / m'a ra m'a ra / badzra dha la / spu ta sphu ta / la lam ta shi kha ra / sa manta badzr'i ni / dzva la ne dzva la ne / na mo stu ste / aa gronya gra sh'a s'a k'a n'am / ra na ra na / h'um h'um spho ta spho ta badzro tta me sv'a h'a / 'di bton pa tsam gyis bgegs dang / rnam @79b par log 'dren thams cad mi 'ong ngo // lha dang klu la sogs pa thams cad kyis mi bzod do // bza' ba dang btung ba dang mal cha dang mchod pa'i yo byad rnams kyang sngags chu'am / blta ba'am yid kyis bsrung ngo // yang na mi g-yo ba'i snying pos de thams cad bya'o // de ni 'di yin te ; na ma: sa manta badzra n'am tra ta / aa mo gha tsanda / ma h'a ro sha na spho ta ya / h'um bhra ma ya bhra ma ya / h'um trata / h'am m'am aom ba landa de te dzo ma li ni sv'a h'a / 'dis kham dang po la lan brgyad bsngags la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sman gyi rgyal po nyid du bsams te bza'o // dug gzhil ba ni 'di lta ste / ai li mitte / ti li mi mitte / ai li mi li mitte / ti li mi li mitte / dum be dum be / du b'a l'i / du ma he / dusse / takke / takka ra ne / ma ma mem ma ma ma ra ne / kashm'i ra / mukte / ai li ti li me / aa gha ne / a'a gha n'a gha ne / ai li ai li ye / mi li mi l'i ye / aa ga ai ya / aa aa ai yi ; shve te / shve te tunde / aa n'a nu rakte / aa ru rukke tr'am aom / bi sha ni ke ta ni sv'a h'a / gang zhig rig sngags 'di lan cig thos pas kyang de la sbrul gyis mi za'o // de'i lus la dug gis mi tshugs so // sprul gang de la za ba de'i mgo aa rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so ; / su rig sngags 'di 'chang ba de la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sbrul gyis mi za'o so ; // de'i lus la dug gis mi tshugs so //gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag sprul gyi mdun du gdon par mi bya'o // de ci'i phyir zhe na / sprul 'chi bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro // 'di lta ste / ai la la / tsi la la / tsakko b'akko / ko d'a / ko d'i ti / ku ra d'a / ku ra d'i ti / po d'a / po d'i ti / pu ru d'a / pu ru d'e ti / mo t'a / mo d'i te / ni ku ru d'a / ni ku ru d'a ti / mu ru d'a / mu ru d'i ti / ni ma mu ru d'a / ni ma mu ru d'i ti / phu ru de / phutta ra he / phutta ra he / phutta ddanta ra he / phutta ddanta ra he / na ga ra he / na ga tattanda ha re / sarba ha re / sarba ta tattanda ha re / aa tstshe / aatstshe / aatstsha le / tsha la bi shi / sh'i te sh'i ta / batt'a le / m'a t'a le / ha le ha le / ha la ha la / ha la le / ai la le / ke pa tsa le / mi la le / danti danti / ta ta ta ta / sphu ta sphu ta / phat phat sv'a h'a / dge slong dag de ltar na dug sel gyis 'byung po 'dus pa thams cad la rig sngags brjod pa @80a * // de dag thams cad ni de bzhin no //gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin no // yang dag pa'o // bden pa'o // ma nor ba'o // phyin ci ma log pa'o // dug 'di mi 'dug par gyur cig / sbyin par byed pa'i gan du song shig /'dzin pa'i gan du song shig / me'i nang du song shig / chu'i nang du song shig / thang la song shig /ka ba'i nang du song shig / rtsig pa'i nang du song shig / nam mkha' la song shig /sa'i nang du song shig / zhi bar gyur cig sv'a h'a / rkun po la sogs pa bzlog pa'i phyir 'od zer can bzlas par bya'o //padm'a kra ma si / pa r'a kra ma si / aa pa r'a kra ma si / au da ma si / na da ma si / ni re ma si / aarka ma si / ao rma si / ba na ma si / gulma ma si / tsee ba ra ma si / a'anta ra dha na ma si sv'a h'a / lha mo 'od zer can bdag lam du skyobs shig / lam log pa las skyobs shig / bdag skye bo'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig / bdag rgyal po'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig / bdag rkun po'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig / bdag klu'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig / bdag glang po'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig / bdag seng ge'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig / bdag stag gi 'jigs pa las skyobs shig /bdag sbrul gyi 'jigs pa las skyobs shig / bdag me'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig / bdag phyir rgol ba dang grogs po ngan pa thams cad las skyobs shig /'khrugs pa dang ma 'khrugs pa dang / nyams pa dang ma nyams pa dag tu yang bdag la srungs shig / bdag la srungs shig srungs shig /'di lta ste / a'a lo //ta lo // ka lo // ko li / aatstshinte / tatstshi tte / bdag la 'tshe ba dang 'jigs pa dang / nad thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig s'a h'a / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //

column1: namaH stu budDAya kRta eka vAram ye hI tadA DAtu DArezu tezu vikzipta cittEH api yaTA eka vAram te sarvi prAptAH imam agra boDim sugatAna tezAm tada tasmi kAle parinirvRtAnAm aTa tizWatAm vA ye Darma nAmA api SRNUzu satva as te sarvi boDAya aBUzi lABina  iti mahA karuNA sUtre pi uktam tat yaTA vAxiSikena mahati udaka sarasi matsya AkarzaNa arTam sa Amizam vaxiSam prakziptam Bavet samanantara prakziptam ca matsyena nig kim ca api sa matsyaH udaka sarasi Bramati aTa ca punar vadDaH eva sa vaktavyaH dRXena sUtreNa sTala gata daNxa su nibadDena yat sa vAxiSikaH Agatya tena sUtra lAGavena jAnAti gRhItaH matsyaH iti tam enam sUtrAt gRhItvA sTala gatam karoti yaTAkAma karaNAya pariBogAya evam eva ye satvAH budDezu Bagavatsu cittam prasAdya kuSala mUlam avaropayanti antaSas eka citta prasAdam api kim ca api te satvAH duzkRtena karma AvaraNena akzaNezu upapannAH Bavanti aTa ca budDAH Bagavantas tAn satvAn bOdDena jQAnena saMgraha vastu sUtreNa gRhItvA saMsAra udaka sarasaH udDRtya nirvANa sTale sTApayanti iti tasmAt ezu SAstR saMjQA kAryA vandamAnAH ca manasA vanditavyAH Bavati hi navakaH pi boDi citta balAt vandyaH yaTA meGena dramixena mahA boDisatvena api satA navakaH Arya su DanaH sarva SarIreNa praNipatya vanditaH niyata arTam ca idam yaTA aDyASaya saMcodana Adizu sarva boDisatvayAnika pudgala namaHkAraH nujQAtavyaH sarva Sabdena AtmanaH pi grahaNAt kaTam ekatra vandya vandaka tvam na viruDyate paraH param vandya tvena eva AlambanAt atas eva anna AsvAdanAt apuNya BAvaH kim ca budDAnAm api evam izyate mA BUt annavasTA ekasya ca anyUna tA iti Arya sarva Darma vEpulya saMgraha sUtre pi annarTaH uktaH sUkzmam hi maQjuSrIH sadDarma pratikzepa karma avAraNam yaH hi kaScid maQjuSrIH taTAgata BAzita Darme kasmiMScid SoBana saMjQAm karoti kvacid aSoBana saMjQAm sa sadDarmam pratikzipati tena sadDarmam pratikzipatA taTAgataH ByAKyAtaH Bavati DarmaH pratikziptaH Bavati saMGaH pavAditaH Bavati yaH evam vadati idam yuktam idam ayuktam iti sa sadDarmam pratikzipati na mayA pRTak kaScid DarmaH SrAvaka yAna saMprayuktaH pratyekabudDa yAna saMprayuktaH mahAyAna saMprayuktaH deSitaH tat te moha puruzAH imam mama Darmam nAnA Akarizyanti idam SrAvakANAm deSitam idam pratyekabudDAnAm idam boDisatvAnAm iti sa nAnAtva saMjQayA sadDarmam pratikzipati iyam boDisatvasya SikzA iyam boDisatvasya ASikzA iti sadDarmam pratikzipati Darma BANakasya asti pratiBAnam na asti pratiBAnam iti sadDarmam pratikzipati Darmam Darma tayA kaTayati sadDarmam pratikzipati apagate budDa utpAde na asti DAraNI pratilamBaH iti Darmam pratikzipati na asti Darma BANakasya DAraNI pratilamBaH iti Darmam pratikzipati Darma BANakasya caryAm dUzayati Darmam pratikzipati Darma BANakaH na pratipatti saMpannaH iti Darmam pratikzipati pramAdena enam codayati sadDarmam pratikzipati IryA paTena codayati sadDarmam pratikzipati akzara caryayA SIla vipattyA codayati Darmam pratikzipati pratiBAnena saMpAdayati iti Darmam pratikzipati AlokaH sya DarmANAm na su viditaH iti Darmam pratikzipati mantreNa mantram abuDyamAnaH prativadati iti Darmam pratikzipati akzara saMjQyA taTAgata SAsanam na avagAhataH iti Darmam pratikzipati sUtreNa sUtram viroDayati iti Darmam vaSam nityam anna vat yezu vastuzu nirmANam iva nirmAnam DArayAmi eza mAnasam  iti kim etAvatI Atma BAva rakzA na hi kim tarhi BEzajya vasana AdiBiH saha tatra dviviDam BEzajyam satata BEzajyam glAna pratyaya BEzajyam ca tatra satata BEzajyam aDikRtya Arya ratna meGe Bihitam tasmAt piNxa pAtrAt ekam pratyaMSam sabrahmacAriNAm sTApayati dvitIyam duzKitAnAm tRtIyam vinipatitAnAm caturTam AtmanA pariBuFkte pariBuQjAnaH na raktaH pariBuFkte asaktaH gRdDaH nnaDyavasitaH anyatra yAvat eva kAyasya sTitaye yApanAyE taTA pariBuFkte yaTA na ati saMliKitaH Bavati na ati guru kAyaH tat kasya hetoH ati saMliKitaH hi kuSala pakza parAFmuKaH Bavati ati guru kAyaH midDa avazwabDaH Bavati tena tam piNxa pAtam pariBujya kuSala pakza aBimuKena Bavitavyam iti Adi Arya ratna rASO api uktam tena grAmam vA nagaram vA nigamam vA piNxAya caratA Darma saMnAham saMnahya piNxAya ca Rtavyam tatra katamaH Darma saMnAhaH amanApAni doubtful rUpANi dRzwvA na pratihantavyam manApAni doubtf ut dRzwvA na anunetavyam evam manA pAmanApezu doubtf ul Sabda ganDa rasa sprazwavyezu vijQaptezu na anunetavyam na pratihantavyam indriya su saMvRtena annutkzipta cakzuzA yuga mAtra prekziNA dAnta ajAneya cittena pUrva Darma manasikAram annutsRjatA na Amiza prakziptayA santatyA piNxAya ca rtavyam sa avadAna cAriNA ca Bavitavyam yatas ca piNxapAtaH laByate tatra anunayaH na kartavyaH yatas ca na laByate tatra pratiGAtaH na utpAdayitavyaH daSa kula praveSe na ca ekAdaSAt kulAt BikzA na laByate taTA api na paritaptavyam evam ca cittam utpAdayitavyam evam bahu kRtyAH hi ete SramaNa brAhmaNa gRhapatayaH na tEH avaSyam mama dAtavyam idam tAvat AScaryam yat mAm ete samanvAharanti kaH punar vAdaH yat BikzAm dAsyanti tena evam aparitapatA piNxAya ca Rtavyam ye ca asya satvAH cakzuzu ABAsam AgacCanti strI puruza dAraka dArikAH antaSas tiryagyoni gatAH tatra mEtrI karuNA cittam utpAdayitavyam taTA aham karizyAmi yaTA ye me satvAH cakzuzA ABAsam AgacCanti piNxa pAtam vA dAsyanti tAn sugati gAminaH karizyAmi tAdRSam yogam Apatsye tena lUham vA praNItam vA piNxapAta saMgRhya samantAt caturdiSam vyavalokayitavyam kaH iha grAma nagara nigame daridraH satvaH yasya asmAt piNxa pAtAt saMviBAgam karizyAmi yadi daridram satvam paSyati tena tad piNxa pAtAt saMviBAgaH kartavyaH aTa na kaQcid satvam daridram paSyati tena evam cittam utpAdayitavyam santi anna ABAsa gatAH satvAH ye mama cakzuzu ABAsam na AgacCanti tezAm itas piNxa pAtAt agram pratyaMSam niryAtayAmi datta AdAnAH pariBuQjatAm tena tat piNxa pAtam gRhItvA tat araNya Ayatanam aBiruhya DOta pANinA SoBana samAcAreNa SramaNa cAritra kalpa samatva Agatena aDizWAna aDizWitena paryaFkam badDvA sapiNxapAtaH pariBoktavyaH  pe pariBuQjatA ca evam manasikAraH utpAdayitavyaH santi asmin kAye SItiH krimi kula sahasrANi tAni anena eva ojasA suKam PAsum viharantu idAnIm ca ezAm AmizeNa saMgraham karizyAmi boDi prAptaH ca punar DarmeNa saMgraham karizyAmi yadi punar asya lUham piNxa pAtam Bavati tena evam cittam utpAdayitavyam lUhA hAra tayA me laGuH kAyaH Bavizyati prahANa kzamaH uccAra prasrAva nizyandanaH ca me parIttaH Bavizyati SradDA deyam ca parIttam Bavizyati kAya laGu tA citta laGu tA ca me Bavizyati alpa mlAnam idDaH ca me Bavizyati yadA punar asya praBUtaH piNxa pAtaH Bavati tatra api mAtrA BojinA Bavitavyam utsarjana DarmiNA ca tatas piNxa pAtAt anyatarAyAm SilAyAm avatIrya evam cittam utpAdayitavyam ye kecid mRga pakzi saMgAH Amiza Bojanena arTikAH te datta AdAnAH pariBuQjatAm iti punar Aha  tena sarveNa rasa saMjQA na utpAdayitavyA  pe caNxAla kumAra sadRSena mayA Bavitavyam citta kAya cOkzeNa na Bojana cOkzeNa tat kasmAt DetoH kiyat praNItam api Bojanam Buktam sarvam tat pUti nizyanda paryavasAnam durganDa paryavasAnam pratikUla paryavasAnam tasmAt mayA na praNIta Bojana AkAFkziNA Bavitavyam tena na evam cittam utpAdayitavyam puruzaH me piNxa pAtam dadti na strIH strI me piNxa pAtam dadAti na puruzaH dArakaH me piNxapAtam dadAti na dArikA dArikA me piNxa pAtam dadAti na dArakaH praNItam laBe ham na lUham satkRtya laBe ham na asatkRtya capalam laBe ham na kRcCreNa pravizwa mAtram ca mAm samanvAhareyuH na me kaScid vikzepaH Bavet su nihitAn laBe ham praNItAn nAnA rasAn laBe ham na hIna daridra Bojanam laBe ham pratyudgacCeyuH mAm strI puruza dAraka dArikAH ime te sarve kuSalAH manasikArAH na utpAdayitavyaH  pe prAyeNa hi satvAH rasa gRdDAH Bojana hetoH pApAni karmANi kRtvA narakezu upapadyante ye ye punar saMtuzwAH agRdDAH alulopAH rasa pratiprasrabDAH jihvA indriya saMtuzwAH kiyat lUhena api Bojanena jQApayanti tezAm cyutAnAm kAlagatAnAm svarga upapattiH Bavati sugati gamanam Bavati deva manuzyezu te deva upapannAH suDAm pariBuQjate evam kASyapa piNxa cArikeNa BikzuNA rasa tRzNAm vinivartayitvA niDi apta cittena su paripakvAn kulmAzAn pariBuQjatA na paritaptavyam tat kasmAt DetoH kAya saMDAraNa arTam mArga saMDAraNa arTam mayA Bojanam pariBoktavyam  pe yadi punar kASyapa piNxacArikaH BikzuH meGa Akula vRzwi kAla samaye vartamAne na SaknuyAt piNxAyAvatartum tena mEtrI AhAra saMnadDena Darma cintA manasikAra pratizWitena dvi rAtram tri rAtram vA Bakta= Cada= Cinnena evam saMjQA utpAdayitavyA santi yAma lOkikAH pretAH duzkara karma kAriNaH ye varza Satena Kewa piNxam api AhAram na pratilaBante tat mayA Darma yoniSas cintA pratizWitena kAya dOrbalyam vA citta dOrbalyam vA na utpAdayitavyam aDivAsayizyAmi kzuD pipAsAm na punar Arya mArga BAvanAyAm vIryam sraMsayizyAmi  pe yatra kule piNxa pAtam Sucim kArayet tatra kule Asane nizadya DArmI kaTA kartavyA yAvat na sa piNxapAtaH SucIkrwaH Bavet tena piNxa pAtam gRhItvA utTAya AsanAt prakramitavyam piNxacArikeNa kASyapa BikzuNA na avaBAsa kareNa Bavitavyam na lapanA na kuhanA kartavyA tatra katamaH vaBAsaH yat parezAm evam vAcam BAzate lUhaH me piNxapAtaH rukzaH me piNxapAtaH AsIt na ca me yAvadarTam Buktam bahu jana sADAraNaH ca me piNxapAtaH kRtaH alpam me Buktam jiGatsitaH smi iti yat kiQcid evaMrUpam avaBAsa nimittam iyam ucyate citta kuhanA sarvam etat piNxa cArikeNa BikzuNA na kartavyam upekzaka BUtena yat pAtre patitam lUham vA praNItam vA SuBam vA aSuBam vA tat pariBoktavyam aparitapyamAnena ASaya SudDena Darma niDi apti bahulena kAya jApana arTam Arya mArgasya upastamBa arTam sa piNxapAtaH pariBoktavyaH iti taTA arya ugra paripRcCAyAm api uktam yasyAH ca antike piNxa pAtam pariBujya na Saknoti AtmanaH parasya ca arTam paripUrayitum anujAnAmi aham tasya piNxacArikasya boDisat iti evam arTam brahmacarya vAsa arTam pAtra cIvaram api vikrIya kAya saMDAraNam uktam kim punar aparimita jana paritrANa hetoH boDisatva SarIrasya durlaBA ca IdRSI kzaNa pratilABa utsava sampad iti tad BaktikaH boDisatvaH vA glAnaH Bavati yaTArUpeNa asya glAnyena jIvita antarAyaH Bavati kuSala pakza antarAyaH vA tena nizkOkRtyena BUtvA nirvicikitsakena BEzajya cittam upasTA vasana upaBoga prayojanam ugra paripRcCA sUtre Bihitam hrIH apatra api akApEH niH doubtful pracCAdana arTam tu SramaNa liFga saMdarSana arTam imAni ca kAzAyANi deva mAnuza asurasya lokasya cEtyam cEtya arTam samyak DAritavyAni nirvRti virAga raktAni doubtfut etAni na rAga raktAni upaSama anukUlAni etAni na saMkleSa saMDukzaNa anukUlAni eBiH ca kAzAyEH vivRta pApA BavizyAmaH sukRta karma kAriNaH na cIvara maNxana anuyogam anuyuktAH etAni ca kAzAyANi Arya mArga saMBAra anukUlAni iti kRtvA taTA karizyAmaH yaTA na ekakzaNam api sakazAyAH kAye kAzAyANi DArayizyAmaH iti atra ca kAraNam ratna rASi sUtre Bihitam ye punar te kASyapa vEdaryAH asaMyatAH itas SramaNa guNa DarmAt udDurAH kAye kAzAyANi vastrANi DArayanti na ca etezu gOravam utpAdayanti tatra kASyapa SramaNavarNapratirUpakam nAma pratyeka narakam tatra kASyapa pratyeka narake SramaNa rUpa pratirUpeNa tAH kAraNAH kAryante AdIpta cElAH AdIpta SIrzA AdIpta pAtrAH AdIpta AsanAH AdIptaSa yaH kaScid tatra tezAm upaBoga pariBogaH sa sarve AdIptaH saMprajvalitaH eka jvAlIBUtaH tatra tEH SramaNa varNa rUpeNa duzKAm vedanAm anuBavanti iti Arya ratna meGe pi uktam yadi Bavet aByavakASikaH boDisatvaH glAna kAyaH pratibala kAyaH tena vihAra kzitena evam cittam utpAdayitavyam kleSa pratipakza arTam taTAgatena Duta guNAH prajQaptAH taTA aham karizyAmi yaTA vihArasya eva kleSAnAm prahANAya GawizyAmi tatra ca vihAre na gRdDim utpAdayAmi na aDyavasAnam evam ca asya Bavati kartavyaH dAnapatInAm anugrahaH na asmABiH AtmamBariBiH Bavitavyam iti punar atra eva Aha te SayyAm kalpayantaH dakziNena pArSvena SayyAm kalpayanti pAdasya upari pAdam ADAya cIvarEH asaMvRta kAyAH smRtAH saMprajAnAnAH utTAna saMjQinaH Aloka saMjQinaH SayyAm kalpayanti na ca nidrA suKam AsvAdayanti na pArSva suKam anytra yAvat eva ezAm mahABUtAnAm sTitaye jApanAyE iti anayA diSA sarva pariBogAH satva arTam aDizWAtavyAH Atma tRzNA upaBogAt tu klizwa ApattiH prajAyate yaTA uktam candra pradIpa sUtre te Bojanam svAdu rasam praNItam labDvA ca BuQjanti ayukta yogAH tezAm saH AhAru baDAya BotI yaTa hasti potAna vizA aDOtA iti Arya ratna rASi sUtre pi BagavatA SradDA Adeya pariBoge parikIrtite aTa tasyAm eva parzadi yoga AcArANAm BikzUNAm dve Sate imam Darma paryAyam SrutvA prarudite evam ca vAcam aBAzanta kAlam vayam Bagavan karizyAmaH na punar aprApta PalAH eka piNxapAtam api SradDA deyasya pariBokzyAmaH BagavAn Aha sADu sADu kula putrAH evaMrUpEH lajjABiH kOkRtya saMpannEH para loka avadya Baya darSiBiH idam pravacanam SoBate api tu dvayoH aham kASyapa SradDA deyam anujAnAmi katamayoH dvayoH yuktasya muktasya ca yadi BikzavaH BikzuH yuktaH yoga AcAraH mama SikzAyAm pratipannaH sarva saMskArezu anitya darSI sarva saMskAra duHKa viditaH sarva Darmezu anna Atma aDimuktiH SAnta nirvANa aBikAFkzI sumeru mAtrEH AlopEH SradDA deyam BuQjIta atyanta pariSudDA eva tasya sA dakziNA Bavati yezAm ca dAyakAnAm dAnapatInAm sakASAt SradDA deyam pariBuktam tatas tezAm dAyaka dAna patInAm mahardDikaH puNya vipAkaH Bavati mahA dyutikaH tat kasmAt DetoH agram idam OpaDikAnAm puNya kriyA vastUnAm yA iyam mEtra citta samApattiH tatra kASyapa yaH BikzuH dAyakasya dAnapateH antikAt cIvara piNxapAtam pariBujya apramANam cetaH samADim samApadyate pramANaH tasya column1: rAga dvezeNa mohena tat sarvam deSayAmi aham
column2: de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so // bdag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du // stobs bcu rnams la mchod par bgyi // bdag gis phyogs bcu'i sems can rnams // sdug bsngal kun las gdon par bgyi // sems can bsam gyis mi khyab kun // sa bcu la ni dgod par bgyi // sa bcu la ni gnas nas kyang // thams cad de bzhin gshegs gyur cig / ji srid sdug bsngal rgya mtsho @91a * // las ; / de kun mthar bgyi nus srid du // sems can re re'i phyir yang ni // bskal pa bye bar spyad par bgyi // gser 'od dam pa zhes bgyi ba // las rnams thams cad byang bgyid pa // zab mo dag ni ston pa 'di // sems can de dag bstan par bgyi // gang gis bskal ba stong rnams su // sdig pa shin tu mi bzad bgyis // lan cig rab tu bshags pa yis // de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur // gang gis las kyi sgrib pa rnams // myur du yang dag zad 'gyur ba // gser 'od dam pa dge ba yis // bshags pa 'di dag bshags nas ni // rin chen 'byung gnas mchog bcu po // sa bcu la ni gnas par bgyi // sangs rgyas yon tan snang bar bgyi // srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi // sangs rgyas rgya mtsho chu bo dang // yon tan rgya mtsho zab mo de // sangs rgyas yon tan bsam yas kyis // thams cad mkhyen du rdzogs par bgyi // ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong rnams dang // gzungs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dang // dbang stobs byang chub yan lag gis // stobs bcu dam par 'gyur bar bgyi //

column2: sbyin pa la dga' ba dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la rtag tu dang ba dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa rjes su 'dzin cing byams pa dang / bdag gi tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad las shin tu 'das par dbugs 'byin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi bsngo ba dang / brtan zhing mi phyed pa dang / pha rol gyis ngan par brjod pa dang ngan par smras pa'i tshig gi lam la khong khro ba med pa'i sems nyid dang / bzod cing nges pa dang / nga rgyal med pa dang / bla ma la 'dud cing rim gro byed pa dang / rtag tu bzhin 'dzum pa dang / khro gnyer med pa dang / sngon du gsong por smra ba dang / tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / kha gsag med pa dang / thob kyis 'jal ba med pa dang / bsam pa dag pa dang / sems la brlang ba med pa dang / gya gyu med pa dang / thams cad la legs par lta ba dang / skyon med par lta ba dang / ltung ba mi gleng ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston pa ltar phangs par 'dzin pa dang / chos rnams la bdag bzhin phangs par @103b 'dzin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la srog bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa dang / bla ma la pha ma bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa dang / sems can rnams la bu bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa dang / mkhan po dang slob dpon la sangs rgyas bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa dang / nan tan la yan lag gi dam pa mgo bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la rkang lag bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa dang / chos smra ba rnams la rin po che thams cad bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yid bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa dang / rjes su bstan pa la dga' ba'i rtsed mo bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa dang / chog shes pa la nad med pa bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa dang / chos tshol ba la sman bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa dang / skul zhing dran par byed pa la sman pa bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa ste /

column2: 'dun pa'i rnam pa dang / bsam pa'i rnam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i rnam pa dang / sbyor ba'i rnam pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rnam pa dang / nga rgyal med pa'i rnam pa dang / bag yod pa'i rnam pa dang / ri mor @107a * //

column1: tyAga vRMhaNa AkAram dAnta ajAneya AkAram bahu Sruta sevana AkAram satya kRtya prIti anuBavana AkAram kAya OdbilyA AkAram citta prahlAdana AkAram apariKeda SravaNa AkAram Darma SravaNa AkAram pratipatti SravaNa AkAram para deSanA SravaNa AkAram aSruta SravaNa AkAram aBijQA SravaNa AkAram anya yAna aspRhaNa aSravaNa AkAram
column2: byed pa'i rnam pa dang / mthun pa'i rnam pa dang / bka' blo bde ba'i rnam pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa'i rnam pa dang / rna blags te nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / yid la byed pa'i rnam pa dang / mi g-yeng ba'i rnam pa dang / gnas kyi rnam pa dang / rin po cher 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / sman du 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i rnam pa dang / dran pa'i snod kyi rnam pa dang / shes pa rtogs pa'i rnam pa dang / blo gros rtogs pa'i rnam pa dang / blo la 'jug pa'i rnam pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la mi ngoms par nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / gtong pa spel pa'i rnam pa dang / dul zhing cang shes pa'i rnam pa dang / mang du thos pa la brten pa'i rnam pa dang / gus par dga' ba myong bar byed pa'i rnam pa dang / lus bde ba'i rnam pa dang / sems rab tu dga' ba'i rnam pa dang / mi skyo bar nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / don nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / chos nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / nan tan nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / gzhan gyis bstan pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / chos ma thos pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par shes pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / rin po che nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / dran pa dang shes bzhin nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / skye ba la mkhas pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / mi skye ba la mkhas pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang / mi sdug pa'i rnam pa dang / byams pa'i rnam pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rnam pa dang / mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i rnam pa dang / dge ba'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i rnam pa dang / bden par byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnam pa dang / chung mi gzan pa'i rnam pa dang / rang dbang gi rnam pa dang / bdag gi sems srung ba'i rnam pa dang / brtson 'grus mi gtong ba'i rnam pa dang / chos la nges par rtog pa'i rnam pa dang / nyon @107b mongs pa'i gnyen po'i rnam pa dang / bdag gi phyogs srung ba'i rnam pa dang / pha rol gyi phyogs dang nyon mongs pa tshar gcod pa'i rnam pa dang / nor bdun la brten pa'i rnam pa dang / dbul ba thams cad tshar gcod pa'i rnam pa dang / mkhas pas bsngags pa'i rnam pa dang / mkhas pa mngon par dga' ba'i rnam pa dang / 'phags pas kun shes pa'i rnam pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams mos par byed pa'i rnam pa dang / bden pa mthong ba'i rnam pa dang / phung po'i nyes pa spang ba'i rnam pa dang / 'dus byas kyi nyes pa yongs su 'jal ba'i rnam pa dang / don la brten pa'i rnam pa dang ; chos la brten pa'i rnam pa dang / ye shes la brten pa'i rnam pa dang / nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la brten pa'i rnam pa dang / sdig pa thams cad mi bya ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i rnam pa dang / legs par byas pa'i las kyi rnam pa dang / mi 'gyod pa'i rnam pa dang / bye brag tu 'gro ba'i rnam pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'thob pa'i rnam pa ste /

column1: prajQApAramitA SravaNa AkAram boDisatva piwaka SravaNa AkAram saMgraha vastu SravaNa AkAram upAya kOSalya SravaNa AkAram brahma vihAra SravaNa AkAram smRti saMprajanya SravaNa AkAram gOrava AkAram utpAda kOSalya SravaNa AkAram annutpAda kOSalya SravaNa AkAram aSuBa AkAram mEtryAH SravaNa AkAram pratItyasamutpAda AkAram anitya AkAram duzKa AkAram anna Atma AkAram SAnta AkAram SUnyatA nimitta apraNihita AkAram anna Bisans kAra AkAram kuSala aBisaMskAra AkAram satva aDizWAna AkAram avipraNASa AkAram svADIna AkAram sva citta ArakzaNa AkAram vIryasya ASraMsana AkAram Darma niDi apti AkAram kleSa vipakza AkAram sva pakza parikarzaNa AkAram para pakza kleSa nigraha AkAram sapta Dana samavaSaraNa AkAram sarva dAridrya upaCeda AkAram sarva vidvat praSasta AkAram paNxita aBinandana AkAram Arya saMmata AkAram anna Arya prasAdana AkAram satya darSana AkAram skanDa doza vivarjana AkAram saMskRta doza paritulana AkAram arTa pratiSaraNa AkAram Darma pratiSaraNa AkAram sarva pApa AkaraNa AkAram Atma para hita AkAram su kRta karmAn anutapyana AkAram viSeza gamana AkAram sarva budDa Darma pratilABa AkAram iti

column2: gang 'di ni don nyung ba dang smra ba nyung ba dang yo byad nyung ba dang srod dang tho rangs la mi nyal zhing rnal 'byor la brtson bas / thos pa'i don la rtogs pa dang / yang dang yang tshol ba dang / sems la rnyog pa med pa dang / sgrib pa rnams gnon pa dang / ltung ba rnams las 'byung ba shes shing 'gyod pa med pa dang kun nas ldang ba med pa dang / nan tan snying por byed pa dang / chos la gzhol pa dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / chos la bab pa dang / mthu dang ldan pa dang / ye shes tshol ba la mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba lta bu dang / de la ma chags par gnas pa dang / tshul khrims mi lhod pa dang / brtson pa mi gtong ba dang / bye brag tu 'gro ba dang / 'du 'dzi la mi dga' ba dang / gcig pur dga' ba dang / dgon pa la mngon par phyogs shing yid la byed pa dang / 'phags pa'i rigs kyis chog shes pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan las mi g-yo ba dang / chos kyi dga' ba @108a * //

column1: Arya vaMSa santuzwiH Duta guNezu acalanatA Darma ArAm aratirata tA lOkika mantra asmaraNa tA loka uttara Darma paryezwitA smRtyapramoza tA arTa gati anugamatA matyA mArga anuloma tA DRtyA saMvara pratyayEH jQAna anugamaH hrIH apatrApya alaMkAra tA jQAna anugamana sAra tA ajQAna viDamana tA
column2: la dga' zhing mos pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i sngags dran par mi byed pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos tshol ba dang / dran pa nyams pa med pa dang / don rtogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang / blo gros kyi lam dang mthun pa dang / bstan pas sngom pa dang / rkyen gyis ye shes kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang / khrel yod pa dang ngo tsha shes pa sa brgyan pa dang / ye shes kyi rjes su 'gro ba lhur byed pa dang / mi shes pa sel ba dang / ma rig pa dang / gti mug gi mun pa dang rab rib kyi mun pas chod pa bsal ba dang / shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag pa dang / blo shin tu rnam par dag pa dang ; blo rgya che ba dang / blo ma zhum pa dang / blo ma gyes pa dang / mngon sum du shes pa dang / yon tan gzhan la rag ma lus pa dang / bdag gi yon tan mi bsnyems pa dang / gzhan gyi yon tan kun la brjod pa dang / legs par bya ba'i las byed pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / las yongs su dag pa'i ye shes 'di ni /

column1: te parivAri atam maha padmam sarve udikzizu prAQjali BUtAH
column2: kun kyang thal mo sbyar nas lta zhing 'khod // gang dag ting 'dzin gnas par rab zhugs pa // skyes chen rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin te // rang gi slob mas kun kyang yongs bskor nas // skar ma'i tshogs kyis zla ba bskor ba bzhin // de dag ji ltar phyogs gcig rab 'jug cing // zham 'bring sangs rgyas sras rnams ston byed pa // de bzhin gshegs rnams ma lus kun du ston // ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra'o // de dag phyogs kyi dra ba khyab gnas pa'i // ting 'dzin dam pa mngon par sgrub byed cing // kha cig mnyam gzhag kha cig ldan par yang // phyogs rnams kun du rang gi lus ston to // de dag shar gyi phyogs su mnyam gzhag cing // nub kyi phyogs su dpa' bo rnam par ldang // nub kyi phyogs su mnyam par bzhag gyur cing // bdag nyid chen po shar gyi phyogs nas ldang // de bzhin phyogs bcu rnams su rab tu 'jug / gzhan gyi phyogs su mnyam par bzhag gyur la // ye shes yon tan phyug po gzhan nas ldang // drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o // @183b shar phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams gang yin pa // grangs med ma lus dag na rang byung ba // de dag spyan sngar zhabs drung de dag rnams // zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rnam par snang // phyogs der mnyam par gzhag pa brtan byas nas // dpa' bo nub kyi zhing khams ma lus par // rnam par ldang zhing mngon sum rgyal kun la // mchod pa du ma rab tu byed par snang // nub phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams gang yin pa // grangs med ma lus dag na bzhugs sangs rgyas // de dag spyan sngar zhabs drung de dag rnams // zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par snang // phyogs der mnyam par gzhag pa brtan byas nas // dpa' bo shar gyi zhing rnams ma lus par // rnam par ldang zhing mngon sum rgyal kun la // mchod pa du ma rab tu byed par snang // de bzhin phyogs bcu dag gi zhing rnams su // phyogs rnams ma lus kun du brtan la 'jug / kha cig mnyam gzhag kha cig langs gyur cing // 'jig rten sgron ma rnams mchod byed par snang // de dag mig gi lam la mnyam gzhag cing // gzugs kyi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang // gzugs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ston pa na // de la lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs par 'gyur // gzugs kyi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur la // mi ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te // stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing // mig gi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang // de dag rna ba'i lam la mnyam gzhag cing // sgra yi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang // gang la lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs gyur pa // sgra dang skad rnams lan la rab tu zhugs // sgra yi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing // rna ba ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te // stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing // rna ba'i lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang // de dag sna yi lam la mnyam gzhag cing // dri yi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang // gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs gyur pa // dri mchog dam pa 'jug par rab tu zhugs // dri yi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing // sna ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te // stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing // sna yi lam nas dran ldan @184a * // rnam par ldang // de dag lce yi lam la mnyam gzhag cing // ro mchog kun gyi lam nas rnam par ldang // gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs gyur pa // bdag nyid chen po ro mchog rnam par ldang // ro mchog rnams la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing // lce ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te // stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing // lce yi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang // de dag lus kyi lam la mnyam gzhag cing // reg pa'i lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang // gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs gyur pa // 'jig rten bde ba bskyed pa'i reg la bzhugs // reg pa'i lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing // lus ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te // stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing //

column1: DyAnaH aBijQa vimokza su Sikzita kasya na tozayi carya viDi jQaH
column2: bsam gtan mngon shes rnam thar rab bslabs pa // spyod tshul mkhas rnams ci phyir mgu mi byed // lha dang lha min dbang po 'thab pa'i tshe // rgyal ldan lha yis lha min pham byas na // de dag 'jigs pas gdugs bcas bzhon bcas shing // theg bcas dmag bcas go gyon bzhin du 'byer // 'dod chags sdang ldan lha dbang de dag kyang // lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na // dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul dbang gnas dpa' ba rnams // lus kyi rnam 'phrul ci phyir ston mi byed // rdo rje 'chang ba'i glang pos srung bu // dbang po'i 'khor gyur rdzu 'phrul chen po de // mgo bo sum cu rtsa gsum mngon sprul zhing // mgo rnams kun la'ang mche ba drug drug ste // mche ba de dag so so re re la'ang // rdzing bu chus gang bdun bdun sprul pa byed // rdzing bu re re'ang padma sna tshogs pa // rnam par bkod pa bdun bdun sprul pa byed // padma re la'ang lha yi bu mo dag / sgyu rtsal kun shes bdun bdun sprul pa byed // de dag rtsed mo glu gar tshul la mkhas // sum cu rtsa gsum dbang po de dang rtse // glang po de yang lus ni bsgyur byas te // lha rnams kun dang 'grogs shing bde bar byed // spyod pa'i tshul dang longs spyod kun kyang mthun // glang po @186a * // mchog gi rnam 'phrul de ltar snang // glang po chags sdang gti mug ldan de yang // 'di 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul rab tu ston byed na // shes rab thabs kyis stobs la sbyangs pa rnams //

column1: saH hitaH itvara puNya balenA Sakra vikurvati deva jaya arTI
column2: de yang bsod nams phal pa'i mthu stobs kyis // lha rgyal don du rnam par 'phrul byed na // 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi skyabs gyur pa // bsod nams mi zad rnams lta cis mi 'phrul // lha la skul ma 'debs pa'i lha yi rnga // lha las rnam par smin pas grub gyur pa // lha rnams bag med gnas par shes gyur nas // rnga de nam mkha' las ni sgra sgrogs te // 'dod pa thams cad mi rtag ther zug min // tha shal mi brtan dbu ba'i ngo bo nyid // sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla mtshungs 'dra zhing // srid pa thams cad rmi lam sprin dang mtshungs // bag med thams cad dgra bcas mya ngan can // 'chi ba'i lam yin mi 'chi'i lam ma yin // ji snyed su dag bag med gnas gyur pa // de dag 'chi bdag chu srin chen pos zin // sdug bsngal rtsa ba yongs 'dzin thams cad yin // skye ba thams cad 'phags pa rnams kyis smad // 'dod pa'i yon tan @186b rnams kyi yul la rmongs // chos kyi stobs la rtag dga' gyis zhes bskul // rnga des bskul nas brgya byin lha rnams dang // lha yi 'dun sa chos bzangs 'dug nas su // gtam gang zhi zhing 'dod chags bral mthun pa // chos kyi gtam de lha rnams kun la brjod // rnga de gzugs med bstan du mi rung yang // de ltar rnga sgras don chen rab byed na // bsam pa ji bzhin gzugs ni yongs ston rnams // 'gro ba kun gyi don chen cis mi byed // lha dang lha min dbang po g-yul 'gyed tshe // lha yi bsod nams khyad par mthu stobs kyis // lha la skul ma 'debs pa'i lha yi rnga // lha rnams ma 'jigs shig ces sgra 'byin te // rnga yis bskul nas lha rnams rab dga' zhing // skrag pa med de stobs kyang skyes par gyur // lha min dbang po skrag pas nyen pa rnams // 'jigs nas dmag bcas de yi mod la 'byer // de ltar rnga skad 'byin pa'i rnga 'dra ba // 'gro ba kun gyi skyabs dang dpung gnyen po // nyon mongs bdud bcom snying rje che ldan rnams // zhi ba'i sgra bsgrags nyon mongs sel bar byed // dbang po lha yi bu mo dgu bcu gnyis // dbang po'i sprul pas kun kyang dga' bar 'gyur ; / gcig kyang bdag dang brgya byin rtse bar shes // gcig ltar lha mo kun kyang de bzhin no // lha mo kun dang dga' bar gnas snang zhing // chos bzangs 'dun sa na yang de bzhin 'dug / lha rnams kun la chos rab ston snang zhing // brgya byin skad cig gcig la rnam par 'phrul // brgya byin chags sdang gti mug ldan pa yang // sprul pas rang gi 'khor rnams dga' byed na // 'gro don mi skyo sbyor rnams ci yi phyir // rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'jig rten mgu mi byed // bdud kyis dkrugs ma 'gro ba'i dbang sgyur ba // de yi dbang du sems can 'di kun 'dong // las dang nyon mongs kun du zhugs pa yis // so so'i skye bo thams cad bdud des bcings // chags sdang gti mug ldan pa'i bdud de yang //

column1: sarva jagasya aSezata trANAm akzayapuNya kutas na vikurvI
column2: 'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur byed na // dbang bcu dbang thob rnams la ci rob ste // 'gro ba thams cad rang gi @187a * // phyogs ma bzhag / stong gsum gnas kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang // stong gsum tshangs gnas ji snyed yod pa na // de dag kun na 'dug par rab snang zhing // tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs shin tu yid 'ong sgrogs // tshangs de 'jig rten pa yi tshangs lam gyi // bsam gtan mngon shes rnam par 'phrul byed na // 'jig rten rab 'das bla na med pa yi // bsam gtan rnam thar gnas pa cis mi 'phrul // dbang phyug chen po'i shes pa'i rnam 'phrul ltos // rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis char thigs rab bkye ba // skad cig gcig la thams cad bgrang bar byed // thigs 'ga'i zer kyang ma shes de med na // bslabs pa bskal pa bsam yas rab bslabs te // byang chub bla med ye shes thob pa rnams // ci phyir skad cig gcig la sems kyis ni // 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi sems mi shes // sems can las smin bsam gyis mi khyab pas // 'jig rten 'di kun rlung las yongs su byung // rgya mtsho ri dang lha yi gzhal med khang //

column1: tatra yaH pRzWatas BItim SrAvayet anyatas pi vA pradvizwaH vA prasannaH vA same prANa pradaH suhRd ali saMhAta nIlena cIra BAraNa BAriNA vicitra suraBi sPIta puzpa SeKara hAriNA yugapad sarva diS budDa kzetra sAgara cAriNA balinA pratikAryeNa sarvamArApa hAriNA naraka preta saMtApa praSama unmukta vAriNA saMsAra gahana antasTa Bavya satva arTa sAriNA jagat netra ucCava utpAdi bala alaFkAra DAriNA viduzA bAla vapuzA loka vismaya kAriNA maQjuSrI saMjQakam yat tat piNxIBUtam jagat hitam sarveNa eva Atma BAvena namaH tasmE punar punar
column2: de na la la rgyab nas sam // gzhan nas 'jigs pa sgrogs byed pa ; / de ni bdag la srog phangs sbyin //

column1: anneka duzKa saMtapta prahlAdana mahA hradam trElokya tRzNA pAtAla prapUraNa mahA ambudam jagat izwa Pala sPIta daSa diS kalpa pAdapam prArTita prApti saMhRzwa jagat netra utpala arcitam vismaya udgata romAQcEH boDisatva SatEH stutam
column2: sdug bsngal kun gyi sman pa mchog /

column1: maQju Sriyam namasyAmi praNAmEH uttarottarEH niHSeza duzKa vEdyAya suKa sattra pradAyine
column2: bde ba'i dga' ston rab tshogs zhing //

column1: sarva AkAra upajIvyAya maQjuGozAya te namaH
column2: rnam pa kun du nyer 'tsho ba // 'jam dbyangs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo // de ltar bde bar gshegs kyi sras //

column1: iti jina tanayAnAm sarvaTA ati adButAnAm caritam upanibDyA upArjitam yat SuBam me
column2: rnam kun rmad du byung rnams kyi ; / spyod pa nye bar bkod pa yi // dge ba bdag gis gang bsags pa // bde gshegs go 'phang mtha' yas ni // nam mkha'i mtshams par dbang mdzad pa //

column1: Bavatu suKam annantam dehinAm tena yAvat sugata padam annanta vyomasIm ADipatyam
column2: de yi bde ba mtha' yas rnams // lus can dag gis thob par shog /

column1: puNya vRdDiH samAptA
column2: bsod nams spel ba rdzogs so /
// / bslab pa kun las btus pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'dul ba mdo sde du ma las btus pa / slob dpon zhi ba'i lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
